_sText:
VERSION_3?!!?1 

Yep, this is a remake of my [first bunny hop map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/112601) which i decided to start right after the release of bhop_depot, 3 years ago. (About goddamn time...)

So, what's new in this version?

- Added around 15 new stages
- Visual change but same map layout
- Few minor gameplay changes
- Better fps than the earlier versions (tested on a 6 years old toaster)
- Easy to medium difficulty in the later stages

This was made for speed running in mind and it was tested on a 100tic 100aa server.

Thanks to Aoki, Highquality, Hoover, Prox, Shellfish, Yaznee for their feedback/help along the progress of this map.


Note to self: Never do a remake ever again.
